Fix sun-movement bug (#61)
Optimize keywords
Bump node-schedule from 1.3.2 to 2.0.x

Schlüsselwörter optimieren

Corrigir bug do movimento do sol (# 61)
Otimize palavras-chave

Bug in beweging van de zon repareren (# 61)

0.2.7.fr:

Optimizar palabras clave
Bump node-schedule de 1.3.2 a 2.0.x
0.2.7.pl:
